name: @drozdik.m/web-unit-test
description: More complex unit testing, capable of launching browser, running a test and the closing down after showing results into the terminal.

scripts.build: npm update && npm update -D && npm run compile
scripts.test: npm run build && node dist/tests/RunAndClose/RunAndClose.test.js && node dist/tests/MinorDOMChanges/MinorDOMChanges.test.js && node dist/tests/AsyncTest/AsyncTest.test.js
scripts.install: npm install -g sass && npm install -g browserify
